body_html:
+1 for this request.

If anyone's interested there's a working (albeit slightly crude) implementation using Keras over Tensorflow here:

https://github.com/WeidiXie/New_Layers-Keras-Tensorflow/blob/master/src/normalized_correlation_layer.py
